long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This powerful chrome extension allows you with a click of a button to automatically shorten any target URL you want to track and rewrite the short URL for you dynamically for each content you will post this short URL on, and track where it is posted. So you get much more granular insights in terms of where your traffic and conversions come from.
